Pre-Game Insights: India has already clinched a spot in the next round thanks to its undefeated record so far in the tournament.
Canada sits fourth in the group standings and looks poised to exit the competition in the group stage.
India has advanced out of the group stage in every ICC T20 World Cup.
India won the first ICC T20 World Cup in 2007 and was a semifinalist in 2022.
Canada is competing in its first ICC T20 World Cup.
Canada has qualified for the main Cricket World Cup four times but has never advanced out of the group stage.
